main event: Radar detected an unidentified object that remained stationary for 30 minutes before rapidly ascending, with no trail or exhaust observed.
interesting points: The object was detected on both civilian and military radar.
The object made no sound as it hovered in the sky.
Several aircraft were reported in the area at the time, but their movements did not match the sighting.
The object's behavior, including its stationary position and rapid ascent, could not be definitively explained.
The weather conditions were clear with no unusual weather phenomena that could have caused the radar detection.
